ygData.subject: Re: the shrine
ygData.msgSnippet: The comm system of the Hellgate relayed a transmission to Daemos. As much as he would have liked to fight in the IGL, he knew that duty called before pleasure.

The comm system of the Hellgate relayed a transmission to Daemos. As much as 
he would have liked to fight in the IGL, he knew that duty called before 
pleasure. He opened a frequency to the IGL staff.

Daemos:
IGL staff, this is Daemos of the Tripredacus. As much as I want, I will not 
be able to take part in this tournament for professional reasons. If 
possible, I would like an escort back to my ship.
